function.name: recommand_travel_destination
function.description: recommends and explains the places for users to travel. It doesn't work when user told to plan the trip

location.description: The area of Korea, e.g. 서울 or 부산 or 대구
The city of Korean, e.g. 서울 or 부산 or 대구

duration.description: the duration of the travel plans, If the user does not specify the duration of the trip, you should ask specifically about the duration of the trip. e.g. 하루, 1박 2일, 2박 3일

function.name: reserve_place
function.description: give the information of place that can be reserved. If the user wants to reserve, it should be worked

location.description: put the name of location if the user is looking for several places to reserve, e.g. 서울 or 부산 or 대구

place_name.description: The name of the particular place that user wants to reserve
